name: Seed: The Beginning
description:
Generations pass, you've accumulated enough power to leave the "Nest" and Terraform. Survive the onslaught of space, Find minerals and Collect enough to Evolve.

Controls

W-Move Up

A-Move Left

S-Move Down

D-Move Right

Left Mouse Button-Attack

Collect Enough Shards to Terraform!

Effects: https://apokalips123.itch.io/
https://ansimuz.itch.io/
Music: Ecrett Music

Sound Effects:https://sidearm-studios.itch.io/

Pixel Planet(End Part):https://deep-fold.itch.io/

Main Menu Platform and Rocks: https://hugues-laborde.itch.io/

Planet BG, Player, Asteroid: Me
